Darkness sensor Sleep Captcha for Sleep As Android (by Urbandroid).
When going to bed, set an alarm in Urbandroid\'s Sleep app and choose Let there be dark/night as Sleep Captcha (after installing this plugin). Set a high difficulty, so you have to keep it dark for a long time.
